00022 #include "dfsch/lib/process.h"
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <errno.h>
00025 
00026 typedef struct processs_port_t {
00027   dfsch_type_t* type;
00028   FILE* file;
00029   int open;
00030   char* cmd_line;
00031 } process_port_t;
00032 
00033 static void process_port_write(process_port_t* port, 
00034                                dfsch_writer_state_t* state){
00035   if (port->open){
00036     dfsch_write_unreadable(state, port, 
00037                            "name %s fd %d", 
00038                            port->cmd_line,
00039                            fileno(port->file));
00040   } else {
00041     dfsch_write_unreadable(state, port, "*closed*");
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 dfsch_type_t dfsch_process_port_type = {
00046   DFSCH_ABSTRACT_TYPE,
00047   DFSCH_PORT_TYPE,
00048   sizeof(process_port_t),
00049   "process:port",
00050   NULL,
00051   (dfsch_type_write_t)process_port_write,
00052   NULL
00053 };
00054 
00055 static void port_write_buf(process_port_t* port, 
00056                            char*buf, size_t len){
00057   size_t ret;
00058   
00059   if (!port->open){
00060     dfsch_error("Port is already closed", port);
00061   }
00062   
00063   if (len != 0){
00064     ret = fwrite(buf, len, 1, port->file);
00065     if (ret == 0){
00066       dfsch_error("Error writing to process port", strerror(errno));
00067     }
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 dfsch_port_type_t dfsch_process_output_port_type = {
00072   {
00073     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE,
00074     DFSCH_PROCESS_PORT_TYPE,
00075     sizeof(process_port_t),
00076     "process:output-port",
00077     NULL,
00078     NULL,
00079     NULL
00080   },
00081   (dfsch_port_write_buf_t)port_write_buf,
00082   NULL,
00083   
00084   NULL,
00085   NULL,
00086 
00087   NULL, // TODO
00088   NULL,
00089   NULL
00090 };
00091 
00092 static ssize_t port_read_buf(process_port_t* port,
00093                              char* buf, size_t len){
00094   size_t ret;
00095 
00096   if (!port->open){
00097     dfsch_error("Port is already closed", port);
00098   }
00099 
00100   ret = fread(buf, 1, len, port->file);
00101   if (ret == 0){
00102     if (feof(port->file)){
00103       return 0;
00104     } else {
00105       dfsch_error("Error reading from process port", strerror(errno));
00106     }
00107   }
00108   return ret;
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 dfsch_port_type_t dfsch_process_input_port_type = {
00113   {
00114     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE,
00115     DFSCH_PROCESS_PORT_TYPE,
00116     sizeof(process_port_t),
00117     "process:input-port",
00118     NULL,
00119     NULL,
00120     NULL
00121   },
00122   NULL,
00123   (dfsch_port_read_buf_t)port_read_buf,
00124   
00125   NULL,
00126   NULL,
00127 
00128   NULL, // TODO
00129   NULL,
00130   NULL
00131 };
00132 
00133 static void port_finalizer(process_port_t* port, void* cd){
00134   if (port->open){
00135     pclose(port->file);
00136     port->open = 0;
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 static dfsch_object_t* spawn_port(dfsch_object_t* klass,
00141                                   char* cmd_line){
00142   process_port_t* p = dfsch_make_object(klass);
00143 
00144   p->cmd_line = cmd_line;
00145 
00146   if (klass == DFSCH_PROCESS_INPUT_PORT_TYPE){
00147     p->file = popen(cmd_line, "r");
00148   } else {
00149     p->file = popen(cmd_line, "w");
00150   }
00151 
00152   if (!p->file){
00153     dfsch_error("Cannot spawn process",
00154                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno)));
00155   }
00156 
00157   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER(p, (GC_finalization_proc)port_finalizer,
00158                         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00159 
00160   p->open = 1;
00161 
00162   return (dfsch_object_t*)p;
00163 }
00164 
00165 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_process_spawn_with_input_port(char* cmd_line){
00166   return spawn_port(DFSCH_PROCESS_INPUT_PORT_TYPE, cmd_line);
00167 }
00168 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_process_spawn_with_output_port(char* cmd_line){
00169   return spawn_port(DFSCH_PROCESS_OUTPUT_PORT_TYPE, cmd_line); 
00170 }
00171 
00172 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_process_close_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
00173   process_port_t* p = DFSCH_ASSERT_INSTANCE(port, DFSCH_PROCESS_PORT_TYPE);
00174   int r;
00175   if (p->open){
00176     p->open = 0;
00177     r = pclose(p->file);
00178     if (r == -1){
00179       dfsch_error("Error while closing process port", 
00180                   dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno)));
00181     }
00182     return DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(r);
00183   }
00184   return NULL;
00185 }
